translations: 用战车运送；驾驭战车（chariot 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: Chariots maintained their place in parades and triumphs right up until the end of the Roman Empire 1,500 years later.
sentences.translation: 直到1500年后的罗马帝国末期，战车仍在游行和凯旋中占有一席之地。

sentences.sentence: But chariots maintained their place in parades and triumphs right up until the end of the Roman Empire 1,500 years later.
sentences.translation: 但直到1500年后的罗马帝国末期，战车仍在游行和凯旋中占有一席之地。

sentences.sentence: Men raced around a track in chariots pulled by horses.
sentences.translation: 人们坐在马车上绕着赛道比赛。
